## WsClient.authenticate() method

Authenticate the client with the conductor.

This is only relevant for app websockets.

**Signature:**

```typescript
authenticate(request: AppAuthenticationRequest): Promise<void>;
```

request


</td><td>

[AppAuthenticationRequest](./client.appauthenticationrequest.md)


</td><td>

The authentication request, containing an app authentication token.
